product_name: Big Agnes Oak Street Air Pad - Long - Special Buy
long_description: For lightweight backpacking, the long-length Big Agnes Oak Street Insulated Air Sleeping Pad packs small and weighs only 1 lb. 10 oz., but is big on comfort for a good night's sleep. Full-length 2.5 in. thick pad is waterproof and lightweight, and it packs down smaller than the size of a Nalgene water bottle. R-value equals 1.5; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). I-beam construction allows air to flow freely between chambers for constant support and comfort. The long Big Agnes Oak Street Air Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack. Special buy.
short_description: For lightweight backpacking, the long-length Big Agnes Oak Street Insulated Air Sleeping Pad packs small and weighs only 1 lb. 10 oz., but is big on comfort for a good night's sleep.
